[Transaction Summary] Represents transaction header or extract to summarize it

```graphql
type TransactionSummary {
  address: Address
  fee: Int
  movementsAddresses: [Address]
  timestamp: Timestamp
  type: String
  validationStampChecksum: Hash
}
```
